scripts.predev: npm run clean && mkdirp build-npm/dist/ && npm run copy:index
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && mkdirp build-npm/dist/ && npm run copy:index
scripts.dev:styles: stylus -w --use rupture --use autoprefixer-stylus --include-css --inline --include node_modules src/assets/main.styl -o build-npm/main.css
scripts.build:styles: stylus --print --use rupture --use autoprefixer-stylus --include-css --inline --include node_modules src/assets/main.styl -o build-npm/main.css
scripts.watch:js: watchify -d -e -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] src/main.js -o build-npm/build.js -v
scripts.build:js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] src/main.js -o build-npm/build.js -v
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run watch:js" "npm run dev:styles" "npm run serve"
scripts.build: parallelshell "npm run build:js" "npm run build:styles" "npm run serve"
